description: This file is a unit test for the WPEFramework Core Library, verifying library loading and function handling, using the Google Test framework.

classes.name: Library
classes.description: A class representing a dynamically loaded library, with methods for loading functions, checking load status, retrieving error messages, and obtaining the library's name.

methods.name: Library::LoadFunction
methods.description: Loads a specified function from the library.

methods.name: Library::IsLoaded
methods.description: Checks if the library has been successfully loaded.

methods.name: Library::Error
methods.description: Returns the error message if library loading or function loading failed.

methods.name: Library::Name
methods.description: Returns the name of the library.
